refnamediv.refpurpose: Set an alarm clock for delivery of a signal

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The pcntl_alarm function creates a timer that will send a SIGALRM signal to the process after seconds seconds. If seconds is zero, no new alarm is created. Any call to pcntl_alarm will cancel any previously set alarm.
pcntl_alarm will return the time in seconds that any previously scheduled alarm had remaining before it was to be delivered, or 0 if there was no previously scheduled alarm.
